name: concrete abstractions
tagline: complex problems are simple solutions behind misunderstood details
body:
### Welcome my personal page at GitHub.

I'm Giacomo Tesio, a developer that in a few years has faced a wide variety of complex problems.

People tends to consider me either a theoretical architect or a pragmatic hacker, but I'm just a programmer that use the best tools for the task to do.  

Thus I can't join any manifesto, nor marry any tool.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
